
======================

### Set name
```php
setName($name)
```

### Get name
```php
getName()
```

### Set boardId
```php
setBoardId($boardId)
```

### Get boardId
```php
getBoardId()
```

### Set board
```php
setBoard(\Trello\Model\BoardInterface $board)
```

### Get board
```php
getBoard()
```

### Set card id
```php
setCardId($cardId)
```

### Get card id
```php
getCardId()
```

### Set card
```php
setCard(\Trello\Model\CardInterface $card)
```

### Get card
```php
getCard()
```

### Set position
```php
setPosition($pos)
```

### Get position
```php
getPosition()
```

### Get checklist items
```php
getItems()
```

### Set an item
```php
setItem($name, $checked, $position)
```

### Find out whether the item with the given name is checked
```php
isItemChecked($name)
```
